name: Kly-Kly
description:
Kly Kly is an arcade platform game in which you have to help a magical creature named Klu-Klu defeat 4 monsters that are located in each dimension. The game has 4 exciting worlds, each with 8 levels of varying difficulty and a BOSS. Your task is to defeat all the bosses!

features
music Henrit
graphics Dudnout
